features.name: Zendesk Connection Configuration
features.description: Configure and validate Zendesk connection settings including URL, agent email, and password with encryption and security validation.
test_scenarios: Configure valid Zendesk connection with correct URL, email, and password
Validate connection with invalid credentials shows error
Verify URL cannot start with http:// or https://
Test email validation with invalid email format
Verify credentials are encrypted in portal settings
Test connection validation via Zendesk API /users/me endpoint
Verify TLS 1.1/1.2 security protocols are enforced
Test partial configuration updates
Clear all configuration settings

features.name: Automatic Ticket Creation Settings
features.description: Configure automatic ticket creation rules for unanswered Answers and Discussions posts based on time thresholds and user roles.
features.ui_location: Admin > Settings > Connectors > Zendesk > Advanced Settings
test_scenarios: Enable/disable automatic ticket creation toggle
Set hours threshold for creating tickets from Answers (0-999)
Set hours threshold for creating tickets from Discussions (0-999)
Configure role-based restrictions for ticket creation
Validate role IDs exist in the portal
Test invalid role IDs show error message
Verify hours must be numeric values
Test multiple role selection with comma separation
Save and retrieve advanced settings configuration

features.name: Zendesk Tickets Module - List View
features.description: View list of Zendesk tickets with search, filtering by status, and pagination capabilities.
test_scenarios: View list of all user's tickets
Search tickets by keyword in subject or description
Filter tickets by status (New, Open, Pending, Hold, Solved, Closed, All)
Navigate through paginated results
Display ticket ID, subject, status, and creation date
Click ticket to open detail view
Show 'No Activity' message when no tickets exist
Refresh ticket list
Sort tickets by creation date (newest first)

features.name: Create New Ticket
features.description: Create new Zendesk support tickets with dynamic form fields, custom fields, and file attachments.
features.ui_location: Module: Zendesk Tickets > Create Ticket button
test_scenarios: Open create ticket form
Fill required fields (Subject, Description)
Fill optional custom fields (text, textarea, dropdown, regexp)
Validate required fields show error when empty
Attach single file to ticket
Attach multiple files to ticket
Submit ticket successfully
Display success message after creation
Cancel ticket creation
Validate field patterns for regexp fields
Test custom dropdown field options

features.name: Ticket Detail View
features.description: View detailed ticket information including description, status, dates, and full conversation history.
features.ui_location: Module: Zendesk Tickets > Click on ticket
test_scenarios: Display ticket subject, ID, and status
Show ticket description
Display creation date and last activity date
View all public comments in chronological order
Show comment author and timestamp
Verify user can only view own tickets
Verify collaborators can view shared tickets
Refresh ticket details
Navigate back to ticket list
Display attached files in comments

features.name: Add Comments to Tickets
features.description: Add new comments to existing tickets with optional file attachments.
features.ui_location: Module: Zendesk Tickets > Ticket Detail > Comment button
test_scenarios: Open comment form on ticket
Enter comment text
Attach file to comment
Attach multiple files to comment
Submit comment successfully
Comment updates ticket status to 'open'
Cancel comment without saving
View newly added comment in conversation
Verify comment author is current user
Test empty comment validation

features.name: Custom Field Management
features.description: Configure which Zendesk custom fields appear in the ticket creation form.
features.ui_location: Admin > Settings > Connectors > Zendesk > Advanced Settings > Field Selection
test_scenarios: View list of selected custom fields
Add new custom field from dropdown
Remove custom field (except required fields)
Display field name and type
Save field configuration
Retrieve saved field IDs
Verify required fields cannot be removed
Test field ordering by position
Validate field IDs are encrypted in storage

features.name: User Synchronization
features.description: Automatically create and sync DNN users with Zendesk users using external ID mapping.
test_scenarios: Create new Zendesk user when DNN user creates first ticket
Match existing Zendesk user by email
Update Zendesk user with DNN external ID
Handle special characters in display names
Verify user lookup by external ID
Test user creation with locale settings
Handle duplicate email scenarios
Verify collaborator access permissions

features.name: Scheduled Automatic Ticket Creation
features.description: Background scheduler that automatically creates Zendesk tickets from unanswered Answers and Discussion posts.
features.ui_location: Admin > Schedule > Zendesk Ticket Creation Scheduler
test_scenarios: Schedule runs at configured interval
Create ticket from Answer post after X hours without response
Create ticket from Discussion post after Y hours without response
Respect role-based restrictions
Process multiple portals in single run
Skip portals without Zendesk configuration
Skip when automatic creation is disabled
Log number of tickets created
Handle and log errors during creation

features.name: File Attachment Handling
features.description: Upload and display file attachments on tickets and comments with support for images and documents.
features.ui_location: Ticket creation form and comment form
test_scenarios: Upload single file attachment
Upload multiple files simultaneously
Display image attachments as thumbnails
Display non-image attachments as download links
Validate file size limits
Test various file types (PDF, DOC, PNG, JPG)
Handle upload errors gracefully
View attachments in ticket comments
Download attached files

features.name: Social Mechanics Integration
features.description: Track user activities and award points for Zendesk ticket interactions.
test_scenarios: Award points for creating a ticket
Award points for commenting on ticket
Award points for viewing ticket details
Verify activity logging in social mechanics
Test point accumulation in user profile
